Normal:

item.title: Need some help please
item.dc:creator: @jamessemple jamessemple
item.description:
@jamessemple wrote:

believe it or not, to change the ghorrock spell it is actually client sided.
what you need to do is, in client.java in ur client files, search ur sendQuest methods for the name of your bank, the report abuse text, and your quest tab interface quests. then you will see alot of this type of thing under it:

sendQuest("", 7346); sendQuest("", 7341); sendQuest("", 7342); sendQuest("", 7337); sendQuest("", 7343); sendQuest("", 7335); sendQuest("", 7344); sendQuest("", 7345); sendQuest("", 7347); sendQuest("", 7348); sendQuest("", 12772); sendQuest("", 673); sendQuest("", 7352); sendQuest("", 17510); sendQuest("", 7353); sendQuest("", 12129); sendQuest("", 8438); sendQuest("", 12852); sendQuest("", 15841); sendQuest("", 7354); sendQuest("", 7355); sendQuest("", 7356); sendQuest("", 8679); sendQuest("", 7459); sendQuest("", 16149); sendQuest("", 6987); sendQuest("", 7357); sendQuest("", 12836); sendQuest("", 7358); sendQuest("", 7359); sendQuest("", 14169); sendQuest("", 10115); sendQuest("", 14604); sendQuest("", 7360); sendQuest("", 12282); sendQuest("", 13577); sendQuest("", 12839); sendQuest("", 7361); sendQuest("", 16128); sendQuest("", 11857); sendQuest("", 7362); sendQuest("", 7363); sendQuest("", 7364); sendQuest("", 10135); sendQuest("", 4508); sendQuest("", 11907); sendQuest("", 7365); sendQuest("", 7366); sendQuest("", 7367); sendQuest("", 13389); sendQuest("", 15487); sendQuest("", 7368); sendQuest("", 11132); sendQuest("", 7369); sendQuest("", 12389); sendQuest("", 13974); sendQuest("", 6027); sendQuest("", 7370); sendQuest("", 8137); sendQuest("", 7371); sendQuest("", 12345); sendQuest("", 7372); sendQuest("", 8115); sendQuest("", 15499); sendQuest("", 18306); sendQuest("", 668); sendQuest("", 8576); sendQuest("", 12139); sendQuest("", 14912); sendQuest("", 7373); sendQuest("", 7374); sendQuest("", 8969); sendQuest("", 7375); sendQuest("", 7376); sendQuest("", 1740); sendQuest("", 3278); sendQuest("", 7378); sendQuest("", 6518); sendQuest("", 7379); sendQuest("", 15352); sendQuest("", 15592); sendQuest("", 15235); sendQuest("", 191); sendQuest("", 6024); sendQuest("", 7380); sendQuest("", 7381); sendQuest("", 11858); sendQuest("", 9927); sendQuest("", 7349); sendQuest("", 7350); sendQuest("", 7351);
what this does is list all the main interface id’s and you can add text to them as you please.
now, if you can’t find ghorrock teleport on there, add this under them:

sendQuest("Level 96: Donator's Vengeance ", 13097); sendQuest("Donators only!", 13098); 13097 is the id for the spell that ghorrock is, and 13098 is the subtext one
hope this helped ya

Read full topic

item.title: Need some help please
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

case 51039:
if (c.donator == 0){
c.sM(“You can be member to use this Vengence”);
return;
}
if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.vengDelay < 30000){
c.sM(“You can only cast vengeance spells every 30 seconds.”);
return;
}
if(c.playerLevel[6] < 94){
c.sM(“You need a magic level of 94 or better to cast this spell.”);
}
if (!c.HasItemAmount(4278, 500)) {
c.sM(“You don’t have any Ecto-Tokens to cast this spell.”);
} else
if (c.HasItemAmount(4278, 500) && c.playerLevel[6] > 93 && c.q8 == 15){
c.vengDelay = System.currentTimeMillis();
c.addSkillXP(500, 6);
c.specGFX(657);
c.setAnimation(1914);
c.vengon = true;
c.deleteItem(4278, 500);
c.toX = c.absX;
c.toY = c.absY;
}
break;

Read full topic

item.title: Need some help please
item.dc:creator: @blindbandit blindbandit
item.description:
@blindbandit wrote:

Hello
i am currently trying my limits in coding and tried to make a donator only veng in the ancient’s tab. I have written it in all correctly and it looks like this. I am placing this veng where the Ghorrock Teleport is placed in the anceints tab. (I can not also rename it to members Vengence also)

I am currently using Project Sony Source

(Located in the Clickingmost.java)

case 51039:
if (c.donator >= 1){
c.sM(“You can be member to use this Vengence”);
return;
}
if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.vengDelay < 30000){
c.sM(“You can only cast vengeance spells every 30 seconds.”);
return;
}
if(c.playerLevel[6] < 94){
c.sM(“You need a magic level of 94 or better to cast this spell.”);
}
if (!c.HasItemAmount(4278, 500)) {
c.sM(“You don’t have any Ecto-Tokens to cast this spell.”);
} else
if (c.HasItemAmount(4278, 500) && c.playerLevel[6] > 93 && c.q8 == 15){
c.vengDelay = System.currentTimeMillis();
c.addSkillXP(500, 6);
c.specGFX(657);
c.setAnimation(1914);
c.vengon = true;
c.deleteItem(4278, 500);
c.toX = c.absX;
c.toY = c.absY;
}
break;

(No compiled errors)

The only problem with this is that anyone can use the vengence even with a donator of 0. Another thing is that they can spam the veng even though it says 30 seconds to reuse if i re-arrange it.

Any thoughts on what i can do? Or what i have done wrong?

(sorry if this is in the wrong section)

Read full topic
